con:method.name: Scripts
con:method.con:description: Get the Dispense Scripts data for given date range based on Script modified Date. This operation can be used to get modified scripts like new and incremental changes in script data.

con:parameter.con:name: FredAccessKey
con:parameter.con:description: Access key related to the store
